Clip.Title: THE REAL STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Meet the deranged serial killers and the determined FBI agents who inspired one of Hollywood's most terrifying thrillers and gave Anthony Hopkins and Jodie Foster the roles of a lifetime. We go behind the scenes at the FBI's Behavioral Science Unit to meet the profilers who became the basis for Harris's characters and to uncover the details of real-life murderers Ed Gein, Ted Bundy, and others.

Clip.Title: PLAY ON JOHN: A LIFE IN MUSIC
Clip.Episode: Play on John: A Life in Music
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Before Bob Dylan and The Band there was John Chohen: the man who saved and celebrated American Folk music.

Clip.Title: STORIES FROM THE VAULTS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Join host Tom Cavanagh as he goes behind the scenes to the Smithsonian Tropical Research Institute in Panama to track sloths; search the Panama Canal for clues to the creation of the Panamanian Isthmus; and rise sixteen stories atop the rainforest in a construction crane to do bug research.

Clip.Title: STORIES FROM THE VAULTS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: At the Smithsonian, science and history - and even art and design - are used to help predict the future. Join host Tom Cavanagh as we look at designers who have shaped our future, sneak a peek at museum of the future, and talk to scientists helping to preserve the future of the tropical rainforest.

Clip.Title: THE REAL STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Meet the deranged serial killers and the determined FBI agents who inspired one of Hollywood's most terrifying thrillers and gave Anthony Hopkins and Jodie Foster the roles of a lifetime. We go behind the scenes at the FBI's Behavioral Science Unit to meet the profilers who became the basis for Harris's characters and to uncover the details of real-life murderers Ed Gein, Ted Bundy, and others.

Clip.Episode: Play on John: A Life in Music
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Before Bob Dylan and The Band there was John Chohen: the man who saved and celebrated American Folk music.

Clip.Title: AERIAL FRANCE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get an up close look at the beautiful French landscape from above and a taste of the rich culture on the stunning coasts.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Eastern Coastline of New Brunswick is an ecological wonder- this aerial survey soars above incredible rock formations, peat farms, and some of the East Coast's most impressive sand dunes.

Clip.EpisodeSummary: Before Bob Dylan and The Band there was John Chohen: the man who saved and celebrated American Folk music.

Clip.Title: TERROR IN THE SKIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Passengers' footage and cockpit recordings reveal how growing trends in pilot fatigue, stress, and boredom are jeopardizing flight safety.

Clip.Title: TERROR IN THE SKIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Recent technical failures aboard commercial aircrafts are detailed through harrowing footage aboard the troubled flights and survivors' firsthand accounts.

Clip.Title: TERROR IN THE SKIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Passengers' videos show flights endangered by various forces of nature, and raise questions about how prepared we really are to fly against the elements.

Clip.Title: TERROR IN THE SKIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Footage from the cockpit and cabins of troubled planes shows how tiny cracks, loose bolts, and other small issues have caused big problems for airliners.

Clip.Title: I HAVE SEEN THE EARTH CHANGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Even in the farthest Northern realms of Norway, Global Warming is taking hold. Here, the Reindeer Herders struggle to adapt as the temperature in the region gradually rises.

Clip.Title: I HAVE SEEN THE EARTH CHANGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: See how the changing climate is dramatically impacting Japan's vital Rice and Fish industries.

Clip.Title: THE BIONIC VET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: No time to rest as The Bionic Vet puts all of his surgical and engineering skills into an operation for puppy Jolly, while battling exhaustion.

Clip.Title: UNDERSEA EDENS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Australia is famously known as "The Great South Land". And it's indeed her southern seas which most define her. The south coast encompasses 5 States and stretches thousands of miles.

Clip.Title: THE BIG BLUE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Watch as cameras capture what happens when the Blue Whale, the planet's largest living creature, has a feeding frenzy off the coast of southern Australia.

Clip.Title: TAIJI AND BROOME: WEATHERING THE WHALING CONTROVERSY
Clip.Episode: Taiji and Broome: Weathering the Whaling Controversy
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Taiji, a town in Japan, and Broome, a town in Australia, were sister city for over 30 years. However, after Taiji became the focus of protests by anti-whaling groups worldwide, Broome was hit with severe criticism as well. The conflicting emotions and anguish felt by the people of Taiji and Broome are revealed here.

Clip.Title: THE BIONIC VET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: No time to rest as The Bionic Vet puts all of his surgical and engineering skills into an operation for puppy Jolly, while battling exhaustion.
